name: NearbyEntertainment
0:
”Alexa Open Nearby Entertainment”
”Alexa ask Nearby Entertainment for Nashville”
”Alexa ask Nearby Entertainment where Paul Grimshaw is playing”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: nearby entertainment
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The 'Nearby Entertainment' skill for Amazon Alexa provides information on local live entertainment. You can inquire by city, entertainer or venue. To use, say "Open Nearby Entertainment" You will be prompted to say the name of your City, Entertainment or Venue. 
You can also request the address of the venue. 

IMPORTANT: Please note that this skill relies on venues, bars, bands, and entertainers to provide information on their upcoming events. They can list their events at NearbyEntertainment.com. Encourage your local bands, bars, and venues to be aware of this skill. Thank you for enabling this skill and for your patience as it gains traction.
